dmca.title: DMCA ISP Follow Up Email: www.bnsservices.com - Sony Camcorder [ThePlanetAbuse-C35983
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2007 4:34 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA ISP Follow Up Email: www.bnsservices.com - Sony Camcorder
[ThePlanetAbuse-C3598370S]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed
important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for
review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================
Original Message
=====================

This is a multi-part message in MIME format.

------_=_NextPart_001_01C76D58.3CE29420
Content-Type: multipart/alternative;
        boundary="----_=_NextPart_002_01C76D58.3CE29420"


------_=_NextPart_002_01C76D58.3CE29420
Content-Type: text/plain;
        charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

To whom it may concern,

=20

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you =
regarding your client www.bnsservices.com <http://www.bnsservices.com/>
=
and our client Sony Camcorder. Your client received a DMCA Notification
=
informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and =
trademarked logos. They received this letter on 3/6/2007 and were given
=
eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am =
showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a =
follow-up on this by 3/27/2007. If you have any questions please do not
=
hesitate to contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com.

=20

Sincerely,

=20

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com=20

compliance.management@netenforcers.com=20

=20

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
=
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
=
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole =
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received =
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of =
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended =
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and =
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

=20

ORIGINAL REGISTRANT LETTER:

=20

3/6/2007=20

mkeroppi@onsservices.com

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

=20

BNS Services

449 Gatewood Ct=20

Glen Burnie MD 21061

=20

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

=20

Dear Sir or Madam:

=20

Sony has retained Net Enforcers, Inc. to assist with the protection and
=
enforcement of Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other =
copyrighted material (referred to in this letter as "Sony Works").   Net
=
Enforcers has in turn retained us to contact you with respect to this =
matter. =20

=20

Sony believes that you have infringed upon its intellectual property =
rights by performing or allowing to be performed some or all of the =
following actions, specifically with respect to Camcorder products sold
=
by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division : (1) improperly obtaining a
=
copy of the Sony Works; (2) creating derivative works from Sony Works; =
(3) illegally reproducing the Sony Works; (4) illegally distributing the
=
Sony Works; (5) illegally utilizing Sony's trademarks in violation of 15
=
U.S.C. =A7 1125(a) and 1114 et seq.; and (6) illegally publicly =
displaying the Sony Works on the following website(s): =20

 =20

http://bnsservices.com/shop/product_info.php?cPath=3D24&products_id=3D76
&=
osCsid=3D081882c9112b2b48c99b84f3fd6c4025=20

=20

=20

There are various additional locations of infringement on =
www.bnsservices.com website.  The above list is a specific sample of =
some of these, but all infringements need to be addressed.

=20

Sony believes that your actions violate the federal copyright laws, 17 =
U.S.C. =A7 101 et seq., and may also give rise to common law and =
statutory claims for deceptive trade practices, unfair competition, and
=
computer crimes.  Unauthorized duplication of copyrighted software =
products constitutes copyright infringement for which the Federal =
Copyright Act, specifically 17 U.S.C. =A7 504(c), allows the recovery of
=
statutory damages of up to $150,000 per product for willful conduct.  =
Even if willful conduct cannot be conclusively established, Section 504
=
permits the copyright owner to elect an award of non-willful statutory =
damages of as much as $30,000 for each work infringed without the =
necessity of demonstrating actual damages.  Additionally, 17 U.S.C. =A7
=
505 permits the court to award to the prevailing party its costs and =
reasonable attorneys' fees.    =20

Sony's rights in the Sony Works are of enormous value.  Sony takes =
reports of copyright and trademark infringement very seriously and will
=
not hesitate to pursue all available legal remedies.  Your potential =
exposure in this matter, should it be litigated, is significant.  =
Despite the potential for a large monetary judgment, we believe that it
=
is in the best interest of all parties to resolve this matter amicably.
=
However, if you do not immediately cease and desist from the conduct =
previously described in this letter, Sony reserves the right to =
institute appropriate proceedings against you without delay and with no
=
further notice.

Therefore, this letter is to formally demand that you:=20

(1)   Immediately cease and desist from using, copying and displaying =
the Sony Works;=20

(2)   Immediately cease and desist from creating derivative works from =
the Sony Works;

(3)   Immediately cease and desist from distributing any and all copies
=
of the Sony Works that you have already copied;

(4)   Immediately cease and desist from violating the federal copyright
=
laws, 17 U.S.C. =A7 101 et seq., as well as other common law and =
statutory laws in any manner not specifically set forth in this letter;
=
and

(5)   Immediately cease and desist from utilizing any unauthorized use =
of Sony's trademarks and violating the federal and state unfair =
competition laws, including the Lanham Act, as well as other common law
=
and statutory laws in any manner not specifically set forth in this =
letter. =20

If you fail to comply with each of the conditions set forth in this =
letter, Sony reserves the right to take all appropriate action, =
including but not limited to filing a lawsuit seeking an immediate =
injunction against you and ultimately the award of damages and =
attorneys' fees.

This office is sending this correspondence on behalf of Sony, herein =
referred to as Client.  Client believes that the information contained =
herein is accurate and certifies under penalty of perjury that it is the
=
owner of said intellectual property rights and authorizes Net Enforcers
=
to act on behalf of said copyright owner, Sony.  Client has a good faith
=
belief that the listings or materials listed herein are not authorized =
by Client, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe on Client's =
rights according to State and/or Federal Law. Please act expeditiously =
to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be =
infringing.

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers' Compliance =
Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to =
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication should be in
=
writing.  Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this =
matter with you.  Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will =
simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers.  If your designated agent
=
or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 =
p.m. on 3/15/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and
=
we will proceed accordingly.

=20

Sincerely,

VCLM Law

=20

Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

=20

LCV/roc

=20

ORIGINAL ISP LETTER:

=20

=20

3/6/2007=20

mkeroppi@onsservices.com

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

=20

Everyones Internet

Chris Newcomb

390 Benmar Suite 200

Houston TX 77060

=20

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

=20

Dear Designated Agent:

=20

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you
=
with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted
=
materials. =20

=20

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and =
enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, =
and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has in turn retained us
=
to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. =A7 512 (c) (3) (A) =
and 15 U.S.C. =A7 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of =
Sony's good faith belief that your client, bnsservices.com, at the URL =
www.bnsservices.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted =
materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, =
specifically with respect to Camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal
=
Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the =
information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of =
perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony.

=20

The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be =
infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing =
Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website.  Specific =
violations of copyrighted images by bnsservices.com are listed below =
this paragraph.

=20

http://bnsservices.com/shop/product_info.php?cPath=3D24&products_id=3D76
&=
osCsid=3D081882c9112b2b48c99b84f3fd6c4025

=20

There are various additional locations of infringement on =
www.bnsservices.com website.  The above list is a specific sample of =
some of these, but all infringements need to be addressed.

=20

=20

Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. =A7 512(c) (1) (C),
=
Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing
=
Material in an expeditious manner. =20

=20

=20

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers' Compliance =
Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to =
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communications should be in
=
writing.  Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this =
matter with you.  Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will =
simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers.  If your designated agent
=
or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 =
p.m. on 3/15/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and
=
we will proceed accordingly.

Sincerely,

VCLM Law

=20

Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

=20

LCV/roc

=20

=20

=20

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com=20

compliance.management@netenforcers.com=20

=20

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
=
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
=
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole =
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received =
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of =
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended =
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and =
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

=20

=20
